price: Mwenyezi Mungu aliye kujaalieni nyama hoa, mifugo, ili muwapande baadhi yao, na muwale baadhi yao.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ لِتَرۡكَبُواْ مِنۡهَا وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-lahu alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-anʿāma litarkabū min'hā wamin'hā takulūna
